main event: Two luminous objects were observed flying in orbits above Delphi, Indiana, on July 23, 1949.
interesting points: The objects were observed for approximately four hours from 11 PM to 3 AM,They appeared to be made of shining metal, possibly aluminum or magnesium, and were estimated to be the size of a five-room house,The witnesses reported that the objects emitted a phosphorescent glare when close to their orbit,The sighting was corroborated by a friend of the primary observer who also witnessed the phenomena in the sky,The investigation following the sighting didn't reveal any additional witnesses.
sighted object: two luminous disc-like objects in the sky
witness description: Two individuals fishing at the quarry, reportedly of sound mind and without the influence of substances.
